title: Food Fight Heats Up for Ethanol
sub_head: Costly gasoline spurs calls to allow higher ethanol-blend of fuel year-round, even as corn prices rise
body:
Can a swig of ethanol help fuel prices go down?
The Renewable Fuels Association, a lobbying group, on Monday announced a new campaign pushing for year-round U.S. sales of E15, a blend of fuel that mixes 15% ethanol with gasoline.
